name: Euchre (No Ads:)
description:
Play Euchre with challenging AI players, numerous settings, unlockables, and statistics! This app includes:
- Random card generator to simulate real-world play
- Single player Euchre against three AI players with changeable difficulty settings
- Detailed description of how to play Euchre and tips that popup during the game to help players learn the game
- Unique "House Rules" options: Game Score, Stick the Dealer, Go Under, Canadian Loner
- Game play options: Difficulty, Play Speed, Auto Play
- Display options: Animations, Show Tips, Gray Out Cards, Face Cards
- Unlockables to challenge your Euchre skills
- Statistics to track your Euchre play on each difficulty

Check out other card games from this Developer: Ten, Five Hundred (500), Whist, War
